49.TitleEnglish: The Hot Sky, In the Desert!
49.SummaryEnglish: While making it to Dark City again, The brawlers ends up in a last path with the desert when they find themselves lost after being swept up in the tornado. In order to go back to Jarbon, they manage to get back by trusting the Crystal Monsters part of the ranch. As the ranch Crystal Monsters are there bringing them back to the land where they belong, the brawlers returned to the Dark City, and thanked the ranchers. As the brawlers traveled to their paths, they are able to get back on track. So the brawlers were able to come back to the place they were.

50.SummaryEnglish: At the lair, Julia reminded her members that there will be the meeting of concerns of getting the Crystal Balls from the Crystal Brawlers. Back to the Furious Five's lair, Grai holds an all-Five meeting, who told them about serious stuff getting the Crystal Balls away from the people, which would turn into the disaster for them. However, the Marukas decided to get involved into the meeting with the Furious Five when they also decided to get their hands on the Crystal Balls. The Furious Five meeting seems to be running pretty smooth, which have led to a disaster when the Marukas interfere. Grai have told the Marukas to exit the meeting, but the Marukas refused to do so and decided to show off. The Marukas tries to pull off pranks, fool the Furious Five members, and tell them how much they hate the Crystal Brawlers. Grai gets dissapointed and scolds them out of the meeting after failing to grab the Crystal Balls.

51.SummaryEnglish: Grai have called up Julia, and he is saying that Julia spends too much time collecting the Crystal Balls, so he decided that it was time for her to get a break from capturing the Crystal Balls and the Crystal Monsters. Julia's break seems to go awry around this episode, as she learns how important world domination is rather than taking some time off of her job as the Furious Five leader. While on the Furious Five's break Julia gets distracted by Grai's warning about the Crystal Brawlers because she could not rest getting them, so Grai convinces her to take a break. However, Julia have refused to do so, and wanted to continue on bringing the Crystal Balls to him in order for him to summon Devil J without permission.

52.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu already have 8 medals in hand, and was going to hand it over back to the register tower. With Kouchu walking up to the tower, the medals are stolen away from his bag by the certain someone as he walked up to the door. While going to enter the tournament, Kouchu went to see his medals, however, they seems to be taken away already. Without the medals that he have won, Kouchu is unable to go to the tournament without 8 medals when they are stolen. When he went over to look around for them, it seems that it was Marcy, so Kouchu went to look after her to get the medals back. It appears that Marcy have stolen them in order to take it to the registration tower, so Kouchu looks for Marcy to get his medals back. However, Marcy refuses to give them back to Kouchu so she could win the league and become Master Champion. Kouchu and Marcy have fought for the medals, however, the Marukas helped her win. But as soon as she took them up... it has Kouchu's name.

53.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers were looking for the place to put their Crystal Monsters around Wenosick City after they were chosen to participate in the fight simulation with the random Crystal Monsters. The brawlers went to the daycare at Wenosick City, in order to volunteer by the laby named Harba (サナイジャ Sanaija). At the children daycare, Kouchu ended up bringing Ninecoat over with him. She have left, leaving the brawlers in charge after she have told them that she is going to an appointment. The brawlers, however, went back to the stadium, however, must return back before Harba does.

54.SummaryEnglish: As the brawlers are looking for another path to win the medal, there happens to be another Underground Path. The brawlers went to the Underground Path for a shortcut back to Path 6. However, there was a stone on their way. Roaracryst and Kouchu struggles to remove the stone away from their path, however, with failure, deeped down that they haven't gotten enough strength. The cavedigger Fossolor told the brawlers that the statue seems to be cursed. However, telling them cautiously about the statue, they ended up having to help them with the statue to take it out of the underground path.

55.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers are able to get back on the road for the medals back. The brawlers went to the Underground Path for a shortcut back to Path 6. However, there was a pyramid blocking the way. In the pyramid, the brawlers get in trouble when the mummy accused them of stealing their gold. Ninecoat turns into a dragon called Tencoat to save Kouchu from a mummy when he is attacked. The dragon, called Tencoat, flew the brawlers out of the Underground Path safetly when he finally has an ability to fly the brawlers around. The brawlers escaped safetly and returned to the Path 6 turn.

56.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers are able to return to their normal paths around the Path 6 turns. In Path 6, the weather's temperature seems to be going down for unknown reasons. Kouchu became sick after being in the cold looking for Ninecoat again in the igloo. Roaracryst tries his best to take care of Kouchu, but gets distracted with stuff to do and worries that Kouchu is in poor health. After the day is done after using the extra medicine, at the end of the episode, Kouchu feels better and Roaracryst became sick, so that means Kouchu have to cure Roaracryst back to his normal health.

57.SummaryEnglish: After curing Roaracryst, the brawlers head out to the Crystal Tent, and they have met the wizard who grant many wishes. While the wizard is minding her own business, The Furious Five have interfered and stole the Mega Crystal Ball from the wizard. The brawlers and the wizard went after them for the Crystal Ball. As the Furious Five uses the mobiles to get away from the brawlers and the wizard, the Crystal Brawlers must ride Tencoat in order to catch up with the Furious Five. When the Furious Five grabs the Crystal Ball from Kouchu, Roaracryst attacked them. However, when the Furious Five were close into getting the Crystal Ball, Kouchu and his friends set a trap with Plantmore and got back the Mega Crystal Ball.

58.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu was given in invitation by Shurika back in Shuriken City. The brawlers head out to Shuriken City again to see the spider cave, but Roaracryst's power shut down again after the Shuriken Tower is out of all power. To get it back, the brawlers must uncover the path of who is blocking the power system. The power system is blocked by a Crystal Ball that is hard to remove. So the brawlers must come up with a plan to get the Crystal Balls away from the blockage. As Roaracryst already had enough strength to remove the Crystal Ball all by himself, he was able to transform into an Aura-like form due to his power illness.

59.SummaryEnglish: Still in Shuriken City, the brawlers decided to take a break and walk around the city. Sakuro meets a girl named Sally, who has a crush on him. When Sally reveals her crush to Sakuro, Sakuro was happy about her. Sakuro and Sally have their first date. Kouchu and Shauna gave confidence in Sakuro into getting along with the date of his life. However, him taking advice from Kouchu and giving himself more "maturely" manners, his behavior have gone far ahead. The brawlers hides around the bush telling Sakuro what he should say to Sally. However, when she sees that Kouchu, Shauna, and Roaracryst are peaking over their date, she left. However, thanks to Squishing and others, his date is ruined. Sakuro confesses to Sally. Dissapointed at first, she forgives him with a kiss.
59.TitleJapanese: 私はあなたの花の男の子です

60.SummaryEnglish: Hunter Grai have given the Marukas a mission since that he can no longer stand their bugging. When the Marukas decided to listen to Hunter Grai now, Hunter Grai give them a mission to change the temperature of the Jarbon region. The temperature changes at the Marukas orders, at the form of the bubble. First, when they heated up the place with Global Warming the brawlers seems to be getting really hot to see what is going on with the temperatures set by the Marukas, then when they cool it down with cold temperature, the brawlers seems to be cold, so does everyone in Jarbon. As they know that they are the Marukas doing those kinds of crazy schemes, Kouchu and his friends went to Professor Shari to figure out what to do with the world's temperature.

1.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers decided to get to Road of Life in order to compete in the League championship. On their way to the Road of Life, The crew must solve the puzzle to enter a tournament. After numerous attempts,the brawlers finally solved all of the puzzles required for the tournament, once they have entered the secret code, Iccryst. On their way to the tournament, they must pass the lava line.

2.SummaryEnglish: On their way to compete in the tournament the crew find themselves in nightmares in the big Road of Life Cave; they must figure out how to surpass then to enter the tournament. While there are nightmares in the Road of Life, the brawlers attempt to defeat the angry Crystal Monster, Rattlette, who was threatening to defeat them. The Crystal Monsters steps into action and to fight the Crystal Monster out of their way.

3.SummaryEnglish: On their way to the Challenge Tower, the heroes met a lonely boy in the Ice Castle and have decided to free him. When the witch who have captured him scolds the brawlers, they must defeat her and run away, and send the boy back home. After that, the boy thanks the brawlers and the brawlers have to continue their path to go to the Crystal Jewels Tournament.

4.SummaryEnglish: At the 8th route, when Doctor Jax has a cold for falling in the big ice chamber, the brawler covers for him. Sakuro, Shauna, and Kouchu begins to take care of the Crystal Monsters while Kouchu goofs off on his own sight at times. However, the job may not be complicated for them when Marukas arrive to mess everything up. So the brawlers drives the Marukas out and Doctor Jax recovered.

5.SummaryEnglish: It's Masari Misako's (Kouchu's mother) birthday. She is planning a party, and Kouchu have promised her that he will give her a special gift. On their way to the CrystalMart, Kouchu and his friends argue what to give her until they realized that their money is missing. After blowing the robbers away, the brawlers have Masari's present:The cake along with the jewelry collection, which she admires.

6.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers are invited to a big event at Vegas City. Kouchu and his friends attended the Dance Festival. However when it begins, the Furious Five arrives as incognito and stole the shiny Crystal Balls. However, Roaracryst chase after the Furious Five to get them back; everyone has a good time when they sang, dance, and hang out;During the dance festival, Sakuro notices that Sally is upset about her parent's concerns.
6.TitleJapanese: クリスタルジュエルトレダー

7.SummaryEnglish: While getting settled for the Crystal Jewels League Tournament, Kouchu, Shauna, and Sakuro decided to go camping when there is no shelter around. Meanwhile, Dustin, Sally, and Broa goes camping with the Crystal Brawlers. While camping, Dustin's happy experiences turn into circumstances that he may not find pleasant. When the brawlers are attacked by Crystal Monsters, the Crystal Brawlers must get away from them.

8.SummaryEnglish: Back in Route 3, The soil on the ground became too rough to plant for people, so Plantmore visits its species to make them work together to soften the soil in order to cure others. Plantmore finally gets the job at Route 3 making all plants grow in healthy shape. However, the Marukas stand in their way, and Plantmore must know to keep their job safe to do.

9.SummaryEnglish: Finally, through the Road of Life and into the Tower, Roaracryst and Kouchu enters the Crystal League, hoping to win to become the Master Champion when he has gained 8 required medals. The Crystal Jewels League begins when Roaracryst faces the first round against the powerful Crystal Monster Pionchamp. Roaracryst won the first round against Pionchamp.
9.TitleJapanese: クリスタルジュエルリーグ開幕

10.SummaryEnglish: After three rounds that Roaracryst won, against Magashell, Flowering, and Sludgermouth, It's time for Roaracryst to face Maruka. However, Marcy and the Marukas have cheated by using equipments on Kouchu's Crystal Monsters. When they won, Kouchu seems to be so upset. Roaracryst was unexpectedly defeated when the Marukas have cheated.

11.TitleEnglish: The Trouble of Furious Five Invades!
11.SummaryEnglish: Roaracryst was easily beaten by the Maruka. After Roaracryst loses his match, the Five arrives at the Great Tower to ruin the match of the brawlers. The Furious Five ruins the tournament and it is up for the Crystal Brawlers and competitors to stop them all from stealing their stuff and of course, the Crystal Balls.
11.TitleJapanese: 猛烈な5人の悩みは侵入する！

12.SummaryEnglish: After stopping the Furious Five from interrupting the tournament, Kouchu is depressed. Kouchu has to be cheered up after losing to Marcy. However, Kouchu seems to be emotional and gives up, however, Roaracryst wants to cheer him up, and Kouchu is happy again, but he decided to wait next year to get the title. So Kouchu have to train Roaracryst more in order for that to happen.

13.SummaryEnglish: When the brawlers go to Clevergreen City, the perfume shop is ruined by the Marukas, and Plantmore gained a perfume scent again. Plantmore gets Mouselette's help, and Plantmore and Mouselette ventures to save the perfume shop. The Marukas dared to challenge them in a match and when Plantmore won, she gets the perfume shop safe.

14.SummaryEnglish: In the town called Judice Town, Kouchu and the gang visits the town where war took place. After Kouchu accidentally pushes the alarm, the troopers attack and the brawlers have to face them. When they fire a big cannon, this is the first time Roaracryst transforms into Turbo Roaracryst and destroys it. After Roaracryst destroys the bomb, he gained a new form.

15.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers discovered that in the south of Jarbon, there is an island there. Knowing that they have an opportunity to go to Jarbon Islands, The crew wanted to learn about Jarbon Islands. They learn that it could be an expenisve place to pay for. So the brawlers have to get jobs; Shauna is the nurse, Sakuro owns a restaurant, and Kouchu is working at the barber.
15.TitleJapanese: サウスクリスタル宝石風！

16.SummaryEnglish: In the Valley Corners, The Marukas updates their company because they are tired of less space and more mess. After that, the Marukas try to be in incognito to get the Crystal Balls. Knowing that they were revealed, the Marukas try to get away with the Crystal Balls so no one could catch them. However, Roaracryst and his friends finally saved the day.
16.TitleJapanese: マルカスはジャークです

17.SummaryEnglish: While still Making Money, the Brawlers roll on to Rock Mountains about the mines. The hiker named Lewis told the brawlers they could get dangerous thanks to the big Crystal Monster.. The big Crystal Monster suddenly block both the entrance and the exits, and the brawlers feels trapped in such an endangered place!
17.TitleJapanese: エンパイアロックを探す

18.SummaryEnglish: Tencoat feels like attacking Kouchu. Knowing that Tencoat's too powerful to listen to him, Kouchu asks for Shari's assistance for Tencoat's behavioral problems. While still working things out, Shari tries to "brainwash" Tencoat not to hurt any of his friends. However, when the fight is on, Kouchu needs the old Tencoat back.
18.TitleJapanese: テンコートがコートを見つけました

19.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers finally earned enough diamonds to board the ship to Jarbon Islands. The brawlers decided to board the ship to Jarbon Islands. However, the ship that the crew boarded is destroyed by the whirlpool of the giant whale. Later, they find themselves in the middle of the ocean with the Furious Five.

20.SummaryEnglish: The crew finally landed on Jarbon Islands and rented the hotel. While relaxing, Kouchu have spotted the place where Marc was born in. Kouchu, out of strong curiosity, went to Marc's birthplace and explores around it. But When he fell asleep, Marc talked to Kouchu about himself and his birthplace in the Jarbon Islands whrre he have lived in.

21.SummaryEnglish: After talking to Marc, The crew met Shari's daughter, Samantha Shari. Kouchu, determined to help Samantha reach her goal, also helped her with the ship. While helping her with the ship, the Marukas tracked the Crystal Brawlers there and decided to ask them for the balls. Kouchu and Samantha have put them out of the way.

22.SummaryEnglish: Having trouble photosynthesising, Plantmore needs a sun bath. However, when Shauna decided to give Plantmore a sunbath, Plantmore has a bathing disorder and Shauna and Mouselette tries to fix the problem. However, Plantmore feels sick and needs to go to the doctor. The doctor was able to cure her with the special medicine seeds.

23.SummaryEnglish: While traveling, the crew met the pirates of Jarbon Islands, who are searching for gold. The crew are volunteer for the pirate's orders, which they ended up fighting over it. The brawlers made a deal to them that the treasure is true to the life of someone named Marc. The pirates share the treasure.

24.SummaryEnglish: The Furious Five follows the brawlers to Jarbon Islands for the Crystal Balls to Hunter Grai. Kouchu and co. believes that there is a big ship they boarded outside. The crew accidentally board the trail with spooky people. Being chased and pranked, and the Five stepped in the traps with them, everyone hatches a plan to rid them off. When the Fuious Five failed the mission.

25.SummaryEnglish: While the Crystal Brawlers are on their way to the new path, Laxmore blocks the path, so the crew have to find a way in the path. Laxmore, too heavy to lift up, refuses to do so, so Kouchu gather help from Pionchamps to lift Laxmore up. But they are going to need more Pionchamps than they have right now to lift up the heavy Laxmore!

26.SummaryEnglish: When the brawlers continues on their path, the loud cry of the Crystal Monster cracks the dark cave. It is the Elephang, who is enraged that its eggs are gone and starts to attack the brawlers. They got its egg back when they surpass some Eggtropine's traps. The Elephang decided to calm down, thanks, and apologize to the brawlers.

27.SummaryEnglish: Out of food, Kouchu and co. went to go fishing, but Hyseno ruins the activity. Multiple Fishkarns saved the Crystal Brawlers by calming down Hyseno. However, Kouchu saved Fishkarn too, from getting eaten by a shark monster, and Fishkarn decides to go with Kouchu. Besides, Kouchu and his friends did not want any fish! Yeah, cause of Fishkarn.

28.SummaryEnglish: In the Jarbon Islands building, Kouchu learns that Iccryst turns human when he read the article from the Islands Library and was curious to tell them about it; Marcy and the Marukas are trapped in the tunnel and want a way to get out. However, they got lost in the tunnel way darker and got scared.

29.SummaryEnglish: The Furious Five sneaks up on the gang for Crystal balls. However, the Island Troopers stands on their way and captures them after making several attempts. So the Furious Five were forced into working in jobs that they have hate- hygiene dentists. Freeded out, the Five manages to gather their Crystal Balls, but they were once again tied.

30.SummaryEnglish: In the Jarbon Islands, the crew visits the Odd Girl Scouts, but only Shauna can join. Shauna finds out that the Odd Girl Scouts can't be a good place to join in when the girls bullys her. Shauna tries to escape with another help of the bullied girl named Tima, the time controller in the Crystal World.

31.SummaryEnglish: Starting a Maruka collection, Marcy owns more than 30 Marukas when she finds some in random places. All of the Marukas even started the economy around her when there is enough Marukas in order to get the Crystal Balls for Hunter Grai. They are also competing against the Furious Five so they could get more money and more attention.

32.SummaryEnglish: While the brawlers are playing sports, an evil scheme surrounded the heroes' ego. The brawlers got cloned by Hunter Grai, who also traveled to Jarbon Islands to gather the Crystal Balls. The brawlers got rid of their clones, only to discover that they are Android Clones of Hunter Grai's.

33.SummaryEnglish: In the Jarbon Islands, the Marukas learn how to make bombs by Hunter Grai in order to stop the brawlers. The Marukas job gets complicated when they argued how to make the bombs. Hunter grai stops them to give them insrtuctions. However, the bombs that were launched turned into bubbles. Hunter Grai is disappointed that he scolds the Marukas and flew off.

34.SummaryEnglish: Still in the Jarbon Islands, Iccryst gave Kouchu a task to get four stones to protect the Crystal World because he notices that the Furious Five have already gather the Crystal Balls. Kouchu, Shauna, Roaracryst, Sakuro, Mouselette, Plantmore, and Squishing prepare to collect them and the job gets somewhat complicated in various situations. Still, the task can still get done.

35.SummaryEnglish: While Kouchu gets all the four stones, Five causes terror around the Crystal Brawlers with their new inventions. The Five teases them they have all the Crystal Balls and the brawlers ventures to get it back with Roaracryst, Ninecoat, Plantmore, and Mouselette. The Furious Five puts them in a net, and the four are strong enough to bounce the net back to them.
35.TitleJapanese: 私の運命によって守られて

36.SummaryEnglish: While the Crystal Brawlers sleep, in his dream, Kouchu is sent up to Iccryst's quarters again. Marc have led Kouchu to Iccryst so that he could give him something. So Kouchu was given a Silver Key by Iccryst to give him a chance to give Iccryst's full power. The Silver Key existed in his bag, but he tries to hide it from his friends.

37.SummaryEnglish: In the Well Forest, Kouchu swipes the sword from the ground and was caught by Zeo, whose sword is given. Zeo have challenged Kouchu with the sword. Kouchu, unprepaired, goes to the Great Well Village to get his sword, even though it wasn't great as Zeo's was. Although Kouchu lost, Zeo gained him respect.

38.SummaryEnglish: In Kouchu's dream, Iccryst is talking to Marc about Kouchu's friend, Shauna Genga. Shauna learns that Iccryst gots a place for her when Kouchu told her that Iccryst is talking about her. Using his powers, Kouchu takes Shauna to Iccryst, and he said she will be "Princess of the League". Only to believe it to be true, Shauna claim herself the queen of the Jarbon Islands at the United Nations.

39.SummaryEnglish: In the unusual setting, The sky is still dark when it's Daylight Saving Time. In order to be able to tell time, Kouchu and his friends arrive at the space to change the problem. The broblem is that the sun appears to get out of image or there is a sun blockage. The brawlers work together with Shari to fix the.problem.

40.SummaryEnglish: After fixing the time problem by the sun blockage, The asteroids invades the island. Hunter Grai's henchmen arrive from the asteroids for the brawler's Crystal Balls. When they refuse, they start to attack. The brawlers and Roaracryst, Ninecoat, Plantmore, and Mouselette begins to fight all of Hunter Grai's henchmen. However, the brawlers were no match against them without help.
40.TitleJapanese: ブレードオブスターズ

41.SummaryEnglish: In Kouchu's dream, Marc had given Kouchu something important. He have given him the Dream Ball, an item when Kouchu dreams, he visits Marc or whatever he imagines. Then, Marc said to Kouchu whatever is in his dream is real. One day in his dream, Marc takes Kouchu to the Brawler Sanctuary to learn more about Marc's colony and his centuries.

42.SummaryEnglish: The female samurai arrives at Jarbon Islands in order to bring someone on her quest. A female samurai chose Kouchu for her troubles when she arrive at Jarbon Islands, and he may find her actions quite disturbing. So Kouchu told her that he quits the samurai Life, however, she forbids him to go quit.

43.SummaryEnglish: While still traveling for answers, The emerald was found in Shauna's bag while she is cleaning her bag out. She vows to return the emerald to someone, but has trouble knowing who it belongs to. When she have found the right person, it was revealed that the emerald have belonged to Tima, the girl whom Shauna met at the scouts.

44.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers know that the race is held in the date by the villagers. The race is held in Jarbon Islands. Kouchu decided to win the race for the big money. In order to win, he must practice with the driving teacher Mr. Tom, and he got on track days later. His racing rival, Ranny, competes against him as they are two racers left. Kouchu have won the race, and commented that Dustin never drive this positive.

45.SummaryEnglish: Marcy was forced into becoming a wizard when Marukas told her to get the Crystal Balls, and points a shock gun at her. Marcy's game into pretending to be a wizard was taken too far when she decided to get the Crystal Balls from around the world. Marukas have also stolen Marcy's Crystal Balls. So the brawlers and Marcy grabbed them back.

46.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers must help a girl named Kelly overcomes her fears of Crystal Monsters that came from her childhood. She then learns that she must protect Crystal Monsters and compares relationship between people and Crystal Monsters. Then, Kelly becomes more friendly around the Crystal Monsters as they are easy to play with.

47.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu and co. much search for the champion of the Jarbon Islands in order to compete in the Ultimate Trial. While searching for the champion, the guards have kicked him out of the Ultimate Trial for forcing them to reveal the truth about it. Kouchu finally found Garaka, who changes his mind about fighting.
47.TitleJapanese: 行方不明のブロウラー

48.SummaryEnglish: In the Jarbon Islands, Samantha wants to challenge Kouchu in the game with the Crystal Monsters, but their game goes awry when the Five members returned to them in Jarbon Islands. Before they start where they've left off, Kouchu and Samantha worked together to stop them from dominating the world and the lives of all civilization.

49.SummaryEnglish: When Kouchu learns that the Furious Five is now successful in the Crystal World thanks to Humter Grai's new powers, Kouchu must help Iccryst with his struggles when he fears what is going to happen in the Crystal World. When Kouchu also learns that the Jarbon region is going to be slaved, he needs to think hard.

50.SummaryEnglish: In the Ultimate Trial, despite getting Kicked out, Kouchu competes in various sports. The sports he and his friends competes in are bizzare sports that they find unpleasant. However, the brawlers have no choice but to accept the callenge to win the sports cup in the islands that they are in.

51.SummaryEnglish: The brawlers learn that they need the ultimate key in order to get something from the champion. But before they have to do that, they have to do a complicated thing. Kouchu must past the test to enter Dungeon's Path for the Ultimate Key. The tests took 20 minutes. After finished with the test, and coming back for the answers within an hour, Kouchu recieves an D-.

52.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu fails the test, so he has to find a way in without taking it. Dissapointed, Kouchu have find a way in the Dungeon's Path by going through the warphole through the tube. The brawlers, one step away from going to the Dungeon King, killed the guards so they could go to the Dungeon Cave for the key.

53.SummaryEnglish: The crew got in the Dungeon Cave, but they are caught by the witch who is going to torture them. However, they escape and the wizard tries to catch them. Even the fight would not work against the witch when Roaracryst, Ninecoat, Plantmore, and Mouselette attack the witch, and she uses her psychic powers to freeze them everytime they attack.

54.SummaryEnglish: The witch pursues Kouchu for sneaking in the Dungeon's Path and once they got away, they are the wanted on the witch's wanted list. The Crystal Brawlers are caught by the witch. To be free, no choice but to turn Birdono in. Birdono is afraid that Kouchu have letted him go to the bird school to the witch.

55.SummaryEnglish: The witch took Kouchu's Birdono to bird school, which is the worst school for birds who get threatened and beaten. Birdono, ans his bird friends, hatches a plan to escape, while being chased by the teacher. The brawlers try to help Birdono as he is being attacked by the bird teacher at bird school. The brawlers finally have Birdono back.

56.SummaryEnglish: With Birdono back, the trio ran when the witch attempt to catch them. The Crystal Monsters also try to attack the evil witch, but there was no luck doing that because of the witch's powers. When the witch finally caught them again, Kouchu promise her that he will do something to spare everyone.

57.SummaryEnglish: The witch asked Kouchu to pay. Kouchu was told to pay 1 decillion from sneaking into dungeon path. Within 5 hours required, the brawlers have to search for money, but the sign says "When you pay, your soul will be mine", so Kouchu changes his mind about paying and he must find a way to life or accept the early death of his life. Kouchu refuses to pay the witch.

58.SummaryEnglish: Kouchu refuses to pay a tough debt, and the brawlers tries to fight the witch. Too powerful for them, they were trapped and held hostage by the Dungeon King, who will do anything to sacrifice them. So the brawlers must find a way out of the Dungeon King's wrath or they are dead meat. Even the Crystal Monsters tried using their powers and their forms.

59.SummaryEnglish: The Dungeon King is sacrificing Kouchu for sneaking in the place with the test required. The Dungeon King have also held the Crystal Monsters in the ce, but a Crystal Monster strikes him. The Crystal Monster appears to be Marc, and freeded Roaracryst, Ninecoat, and the other Crystal Monsters from the kidnapping session to defeat the Dungeon King. Defeating the Dungeon King was a success.

60.SummaryEnglish: The Crystal Monster reveals to be Marc who have saved the Crystal Brawlers in the first place, and sends the injured Kouchu and his friends to the Rock Cave to tell them about the Dungeon Path. When Marc have mentioned that the Ultimate Key is the way to protect the world, Kouchu have admitted that he has the Ultimate Key.

1.SummaryEnglish: When the brawlers are still in Jarbon Islands, Kouchu breaks the Rocky Hand,which leads to Mine City. He and his frienda are then chased by an angry mob from breaking it. Kouchu tries to reason with the angry mob that he does not know about the Mine City hand.

2.SummaryEnglish: Roaracryst has a big cold after it is outside in the cold protecting Plantmore from being into the snowstorm. Kouchu gets through trouble to get Roaracryst medicine. Plantmore also thanked Roaracryst for the sacrifice that he made for protecting Plantmore, with Ninecoat's help to keep her warm and strong. Roaracryst feels better.
2.TitleJapanese: ロアキジュシク・スルス

3.SummaryEnglish: Still in the Jarbon Islands, Kouchu was given a kit for the big Silver Key so it can be safe. The kit is Kouchu's big responsibility for him to learn throughout his life. However, the kit was sold and Kouchu must take it back, but it might be too expensive. Kouchu went in there and confess.
